title.narrative: Renovation and operation of 3 schools in the Mogadishu and Hiran region of the Federal Republic of Somalia (Balad School, Dr. Ahmed Haji School and Sheikh Adam Abdullah School)

description.narrative: Restoration, operation and capacity building of educational and administrative cadres in 3 educational schools in Somalia for a period of (16) months

The project aims to provide appropriate educational environments and equip them with basic school needs in communities in need, and to improve the quality of the educational process in educational institutions through the restoration and operation of public education schools in order to fulfill their educational mission to the fullest extent, and to build the capacities of educational and administrative cadres to ensure the continuation and continuity of education for children at school age.
